title: Help still needed
body: Apparently I still can't record any highlight. This is very unexpected and weird. Did nothing on the client or my computer that created such a problem. Tried full repair and Hextech Repair Tool multiple times, still failed.

replies.body: What exactly is going wrong that prevents you from recording highlights? I can do my best to troubleshoot but there's not much info here as to what's going wrong.
My League client (not the in-game client) while I'm in-game crashes too, but sometimes.
It just bugsplats every time I wanted to record. Happens to all games.
